Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A traditional samauri katana, it bares a long worn blade with a serrated edge and tip. The blade shines brightly as the light passes over it, almost blinding anyone looking directly at it. Upon the blade are a series of kanji scripter engraved masterfully into the blade itself. The hilt of the katana is made of a smooth onyx crystal hand grip wrapped in silk and leather straps allowing for a surer grip. There is a wide hole cut into the middle of the onyx hilt, in which is suspended a pale blue crystal ball, completely transparent. However when you look through it you do not see through to the other side.
